summary: Fahim Nadir Kashif, PA-C, had his physician assistant license suspended by the Maryland State Board of Physicians due to delinquent child support payments totaling $12,402.01. The Board acted on a request from the Child Support Enforcement Administration after Mr. Kashif failed to contest his identity or resolve the arrears. His license will remain suspended until the Board receives notification from the Administration that it should be reinstated.
